Content.Text:
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? 'Morning. What can I do for you?
<PAGE>
You're the one who stopped me. You have
something on your mind?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning. Do you behave this way with
everyone you meet? Don't you think
you're being rude?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...'Morning. You stopped to greet me,
knowing how busy I am? I hope you're
not going to waste my time.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. Many of the residents here
are very healthy and rarely come to the
hospital.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you want? I wish you wouldn't
interrupt me when I'm deep in thought.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you have a habit of stopping people
without any regard to who they are or 
what they are doing?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's already nighttime. You should go
home and go to bed. If you collapse
tomorrow, I won't help you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you need to talk, can you wait until
tomorrow? I'm very busy.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hmm... it's nighttime. Time sure goes by
quickly.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm... it's hard to get sick around this
time of year. More extreme temperatures
are required to threaten your health.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't mind getting wet in the rain?
My, my, you are amazingly robust.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...people eat too many cold foods and
end up with stomach trouble around this
season. They need to take more care.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You amaze me. Did you really think you
won't get sick after getting drenched
like that?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm...So many cases in fall of people
overeating. Can't they control their
appetite?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You should hurry and bathe before you
catch a cold. Take better care of
yourself.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm.. Many cases at this time of year
of people catching cold from playing in
the snow. I don't suffer fools gladly.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You came here in the snow? Like rain,
snow is a mass of moisture. You'll catch
a cold, walking bare-headed like that.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Are you crazy? Going out in this wind?
There's no other word to describe you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you crazy? Going out in this snow?
There's no other word to describe you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I heard. You're in a relationship?
<PAGE>
Well, just don't cause trouble to the
people around you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There aren't many sick people in this
town. I wonder if it's due to this
environment. Might be worth checking.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The temperatures around here are warmer
than other places. Could this also be
affecting the town's health?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The river here is absolutely clean. Does
the secret to good health also lie in
this water?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm looking for foodstuffs, but also
some medicinal herbs. So don't bother
me, will you?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are many mysterious components in
the lake. By uncovering their secrets,
perhaps a new medicine can be developed.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Hmm, I'm becoming curious. I must look
into this more closely.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, the food I gather here is tastier
than that from other towns. Could this
also be due to the environment?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is your farm? There's nothing
special about it. I'm not impressed.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is it fulfilling to have a farm? I just 
can't understand.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm very interested in mines. There are
minerals I can use for natural remedies.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Some people become depressed after a
prolonged stay in dark places like this.
<PAGE>
If you can relate to that, be careful.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If I'm not busy, it's because everyone
is healthy. I think that's a good thing.
<PAGE>
But in this town, I think the cause is
just that there aren't enough people.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If seems more people are coming into
town, but there are still many empty 
lots.
<PAGE>
You must build more homes and get people
to move here. And when you're overworked
and exhausted, come to me.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is becoming more lively. I'm
getting patients more often now.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Living in town gets more difficult when
the population grows. But it's very easy
in this town.
<PAGE>
I think it's thanks to your efforts. So
I want to thank you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Can I at least get some privacy while
I'm resting? I'm tired.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Watching people carefully allows you to
understand their mental state through
observing what they do.
<PAGE>
It's especially easy to see when someone
is lying. A liar is very easy to spot.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Being a doctor can be difficult. When
someone in the medical profession gets
sick, they tend to underestimate it.
<PAGE>
But I'm not so foolish as to do that.
Plus I always take care of my health.
<PAGE>
If I should collapse, this town would be
in trouble, right? I'm well aware of
that, so don't you worry.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My family? Well, I have a wife and
child, but they don't live with me at
the moment.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>I wish you wouldn't probe into people's
lives. You are lacking in tact.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The residents here have a tendency to be
overly nice. They frequently bring me
food to eat.
<PAGE>
In other towns, many had ulterior
motives when bringing things, but that's
not the case here, not at all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Whenever someone here has brought me
something it has always felt genuine.
That's a very nice feeling.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What I used to do in the past? Are you
serious? I was a doctor, what else?
<PAGE>
At the last town I lived in, I worked at
a major hospital. But those large
hospitals are so noisy.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You need to always be on your guard in
an environment like that. It wasn't for
me, so I came here.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm, it's you. You may accompany me, so
long as you don't get in my way.
<PAGE>
I can't believe I've come to feel this
way. The human heart certainly is most
unpredictable.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, pasta salad. It ranks extremely
high in nutritional balance. My thanks
for this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh, this is good. It's really good. I'm
quite satisfied.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, this is a fine thing. It's a present
for me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hmm, this is very good. <MYNAME>, I'm
grateful to you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, this is nice. It's a present for
me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Then I'll accept your kindness. Thank
you.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a present for me? Then I'll
accept.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What is this present for? I don't quite
understand.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This present really conveys your ill
will towards me.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ch-Chocolate cake... why are you
bringing this to me? Some act of
misguided revenge?
<PAGE>
I have done nothing to you! Why can't
you see that?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, that size... You can't grow
anything this big without extreme
effort. Hmm, I accept.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I-It's ridiculously huge. What kind of
magic did you use? Hmm, I gladly accept
it, anyway.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it? Standing there with that
thing in your arms; you're totally in
my way.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, are you thinking straight? I
believe I already received one today.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know my birthday? Well, not
that it matters... so, what do you want?
<PAGE>
Oh? Pasta salad for me? This looks good.
I'll have some.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Mmm, delicious. You're a fine cook.
Thank you, it was good.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know that it's my birthday?
Well, not that it matters... what do you
want?
<PAGE>
Have you been studying up on me?
Otherwise, how would you know my likes?
I'd better watch out.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Oh, I'll accept your present. You read
me well. I appreciate this.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know that it's my birthday?
Well, not that it matters... what do you
want?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Well, if you asked me if I liked this,
I'd tell you that I do. I appreciate
this.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know that it's my birthday?
Well, not that it matters... what do you
want?
<PAGE>
Hmm, I'll accept. I appreciate this.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know that it's my birthday?
Well, not that it matters... what do you
want?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What's the meaning of this? Why give
me something I dislike? If this is
supposed to be a joke, it's not funny!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know that it's my birthday?
Well, not that it matters... what do you
want?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Why would you upset me? You couldn't
have known how much I hate this!
<PAGE>
I'm feeling sick. You should know
better.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know that it's my birthday?
Well, not that it matters... what do you
want?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Ch-Chocolate cake...? Why are you trying
to scare me? You're a terrible person!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know it's my birthday? Well,
not that it matters.
<PAGE>
The size and the quality... It all looks
delicious. You have my gratitude.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How did you know it's my birthday? Well,
not that it matters...
<PAGE>
It's so big, it makes me wonder if it's
safe to eat. Hmm, then I'll take a bite.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, the Flower Festival... I don't
understand the significance, but I
guess I'll accept it.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A Pumpkin Festival? How silly. It's a
festival for noisy kids!
<PAGE>
But since you got it, I guess I'll
accept.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue feather...? How silly. Just what
is it you want to do?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring...? How silly. Just what is it
you want to do?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I hate animals. Please, keep all animals
away from me!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ahem... I heard it was your birthday, so
I brought you a present.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Take it. It's from me.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your birthday? That has nothing to do
with me.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it? Oh, it's you... I haven't
seen you in a while. I guess that means
you're healthy, at least.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you don't feel well, I'll examine
you, but otherwise, please leave.

The body... internal... resistance...
Mmm... materialistic thinking is... the
antithesis of... yawn...

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you want?
<PAGE>
I'm still eating. Is your business so
important as to interrupt my meal?
<PAGE>
If it is not an emergency then please
don't bother me while I'm eating.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wooden benches have a warmth to them.
Sitting on one and reading a book can
make you forget all about time.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White benches are nice because they look
so clean. Maybe, not literally... But
it's just that feeling.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do scarecrows think about? All they
do is to stand with arms outspread.
<PAGE>
They don't have to use their heads for
that. So they must be thinking of
something else. Or is this too deep?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a grand weathervane. I guess there
are people here who have to watch the
direction and strength of the wind.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are milk cans, but what do you use
them for?
<PAGE>
Milk cans are used to store milk. So
use them properly, for milk.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are these bricks stacked up?
<PAGE>
If you're not building anything, can you
please put them away?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice pot. What? It's made of
mithril?
<PAGE>
Did you make it? Impressive.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a pretty nice wagon there. It's a
waste if you don't use it. Why don't you
use it to sell something?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice table. It's perfect for
tea time.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a nice chair. Perfect for taking
a rest during a stroll.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A parasol table. Perfect for having tea
in the garden.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A brick pillar has a feeling of history.
...But why is there only a pillar?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Having a water fountain is so nice when
you take a stroll and are looking to
cool off.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a well, but can you get water
from it?
<PAGE>
...What? No water? Then why did you dig
a well? I don't get it.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's good to have a fire extinguisher.
Not only because you're safe if a fire
should break out.
<PAGE>
More because it gives you peace of mind.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a big daruma. It's said the
daruma sat continuously in order to
attain enlightenment.
<PAGE>
I could never just sit continuously
without thinking about something.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's a bamboo fountain doing in a 
place like this? Did you put it there?
<PAGE>
You have very refined taste. Hmm...
What a soothing sound.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an interesting vehicle. What does
it run on?
<PAGE>
...A coin? ...I didn't mean that. What
is its power source?
<PAGE>
...Coins? ...Never mind. My mistake.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the atmosphere around here. Just
right for a stroll.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the atmosphere around here. It
makes me want to take a leisurely
stroll.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the atmosphere around here, but
it's a bit too busy. I prefer more
simplicity.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a beautiful yard. It's extravagant
with lots of work put into it. I can't
imagine all the care it requires.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sunflowers always face the sun.
<PAGE>
I wonder how it looks at night? It faces
down?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nadeshiko flowers are pretty, but very
unassuming. That's what I like about
them.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing like a white rose. Not
red nor blue, but white. White roses
have a lovely feeling of innocence.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Snowdrop is the perfect name for that
flower.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cactuses are very hearty and can survive
under harsh conditions. Their flowers
are very pretty, too.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sunflowers always face the sun.
<PAGE>
I wonder how it looks at night? It faces
down?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Nadeshiko flowers are pretty, but very
unassuming. That's what I like about
them.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing like a white rose. Not
red nor blue, but white. White roses
have a nice feeling of innocence.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Snowdrop is the perfect name for that
flower.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cactuses are very hearty and can survive
under harsh conditions. Their flowers
are very pretty, too.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This bonsai is very nice, with excellent
branches. Did you create it? I must say,
a very nice piece of work.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A potted cherry tree is nice. I can put
it where I want and admire it without
anyone getting in my way.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A potted gingko tree is nice. I can put
it where I want and enjoy the changing
of the seasons.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Having evergreens in the yard means
color, even in winter. In particular,
conifers have pleasant shapes.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Potted plants sculpted into circular
shapes are called topiaries? That's nice
pruning.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A rounded potted plant with two tiers.
...It's very clever, but is there one
with three tiers?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
White fences feel good. They make the
streets look so clean.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Chained poles are used to mark walkways
as well to restrict entry. Which is
this?
<PAGE>
You haven't really thought about it. I
figured as much.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Brick walls have a feeling of history.
Although, the ones around here are
probably quite recent.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is it, <MYNAME>? Is there something
you want me to treat?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It will cost <BLUE>1000 G</BLUE> to restore your
Stamina. Is that all right?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It will cost <BLUE>3000 G</BLUE> to restore your
Health. Is that all right?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't have time for your silly jokes.
If you have nothing else to do, go home.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You don't have enough money. You better
come another time.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. If you need treatment, come
again.

Now is not the time to be giving
presents.
